name: European Association of Mining Industries, Metal Ores & Industrial Minerals
goal: The purpose of the Association is to study all problems met by the European mining industry in all phases of its activities, including scientific, technological and environmental matters, as well as to research and propose solutions related to the above-mentioned problems. In connection therewith, the Association will provide to its members educational sessions and encourage the exchange of information between its members and with members of similar international organisations. When deemed appropriate, it will make the knowledge resulting thereof available to international, European and national authorities, and to the public in general.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Industrial policy
EU Raw materials policy
EU Trade and External Affairs policies
EU Development Policy
EU Regional Policy
Climate change, energy and ETS legislation
EU EHS policies and legislation
